sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis misses the Good Friday way of the cross procession in Rome because of the intense cold, the Holy See says.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Global food prices have dropped by just over a fifth after Russia allowed Ukraine to export more of its grain, but they're still too high.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Bulgarian and Romanian farmers protest after cheap Ukrainian agricultural imports

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: flood their local markets, hitting their profits.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Pope's physical endurance seems to have reached its limit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Francis failed to take part in the traditional Way of the Cross on Good Friday in the Colosseum in Rome due to the intense cold, the Holy See said.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Francis was hospitalized last week with bronchitis, but up to now he'd completed all the rituals of Holy Week, including mass on Friday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In a tense Jerusalem, Christians marked Good Friday without incident, despite a flare-up of Arab-Israeli violence nearby.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Christians in the Holy City took part in a vigil and a procession, recreating the path that Jesus Christ walked carrying the cross before being crucified.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In Spain, hundreds of thousands of people held processions through the streets of many cities and towns. Semana Santa is a tradition that the country has passionately held for centuries and is a solemn but spectacular ritual.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Global food prices have dropped by just over a fifth in the past year, according to the UN's food agency, mainly because of the Black Sea deal with Russia that allows Ukraine to export more of its grain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In March last year, Russia's invasion sent food prices skyrocketing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But even with the fall, they're still too high.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And then there are global shortages of agricultural fertilizers to contend with.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They mostly come from Russia, but it's been hit by sanctions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Before the war, Ukraine exported 10% of the world's wheat, 15% of the corn and 13% of the barley, according to the European Commission.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Luckily, Australia and the EU have produced more than was expected, and the Black Sea grain deal has likely saved many lives in Africa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Ukraine war couldn't have come at a worse time for the continent, where there was already a deadly drought in the Horn of Africa and worsening food insecurity in the Sahel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But in Europe, people aren't yet noticing drops in food prices in the Horn of Africa and worsening food insecurity in the Sahel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But in Europe, people aren't yet noticing drops in food prices in the supermarkets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They remain stubbornly high.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: At the Romanian border, Bulgarian farmers have had enough, so they're blocking Ukrainian trucks trying to enter their country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They say Bulgaria has been flooded with duty-free imports of grain and other agricultural products that have come from Ukraine via Romania. And they point to the local market where they say prices there have plunged. Poland, Slovakia, Hungary, Romania and Bulgaria all called on the European Commission to compensate their farmers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Protests were also held in Romania on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In Poland, the agriculture minister was forced to resign last week, and on Friday Ukraine said it would suspend wheat, corn, rapeseed and sunflower seed exports to Poland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But products transiting Poland will still be exported.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Two British nationals shot at in the occupied West Bank, the latest violent act between Israelis and Palestinians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The two were sisters who'd just emigrated to Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They were shot at in their car by Palestinian gunmen in a settlement near Bethlehem.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Their mother, who was with them, was injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Their father, who was driving another car in front of them, was unharmed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The two were evacuated to hospital but died soon afterwards.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Hours earlier, Israel had hit southern Lebanon with airstrikes, saying it was targeting Hamas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: They struck farm buildings near a Palestinian refugee camp close to the town of Khalili, killing livestock and causing minor injuries to some of the residents there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Israel also struck what it said were tunnels and weapons factories in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: That was in response to Palestinians firing rockets into southern Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: No one was killed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In Jerusalem, Hamas staged a protest during Friday prayers at the Al-Aqsa Mosque compound, which Jews call the Temple Mount, their holiest site.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The tensions are high.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Muslims are observing Ramadan, Jews are celebrating Passover and Christians are marking Easter.
